properties.description: The theatre building is modern, accessible and open to all. Their is a café bar available for drinks & food, however there isn't a requirement to purchase anything to use the space (from January we will have catering offers). Wifi is available, and there is a selection of different seating options including tables and chairs, sofas and bar seating. Throughout December we will be very busy with our pantomime, so the builidng will be busy, often with large groups of children and families. From mid January the builidng will be much quieter during the day.

properties.address: 18-20 Cornard Road, Sudbury, UK
properties.description: A space for you to come in, stay warm and socialise, or if you prefer to simply take a seat, quietly read a book or newspaper and enjoy a warm drink and snack in a comfortable safe environment. Not only can we offer a warm and friendly welcome but if you would like to, the chance to learn a new skill, to try something different and the opportunity to gain recognised qualifications. Most of courses we provide are fully funded and can be offered to you for free.

hours._text: Tuesdays & Wednesdays (01.11.2022 - 31.03.2023 except 27th & 28th December and 3rd January) 13.00 - 16.30

properties.title: WARM SPACES - West Suffolk College Sudbury

properties.address: Stonehouse Road, Hadleigh, Ipswich, Suffolk IP7 5BH, UK
properties.description: A space for you to come in, stay warm, take a seat read a book or news paper and enjoy a warm drink in a comfortable and seated environment . *1-3pm weekends ONLY- an opportunity to socialise, take part in various activities (physical and/or social) in our warm community room and heat your meals from home! We can also offer you free access to showers and casual swimming sessions *excluding swim academy classes- take part in our weekend sessions to find out more.
properties.title: WARM SPACES - Abbeycroft Leisure – Hadleigh Pool & Leisure Centre

properties.description: A space for you to come in, stay warm, take a seat, read a book or news paper and enjoy a warm drink in a comfortable and seated environment . *1-3pm weekends ONLY- an opportunity to socialise, take part in various activities (physical and/or social) in our warm community room and heat your meals from home! properties.title: WARM SPACES - Abbeycroft Leisure – Kingfisher Leisure Centre

properties.address: Town Hall, Old Market Place, Sudbury CO10 1TL, UK
properties.description: Sudbury Tourist & Heritage Centre welcomes anyone and everyone who needs a warm space (and a friendly face) to The Town Hall. Free services: Complimentary hot drinks available in the TIC. Free local history displays in our Heritage Centre & Museum. Charging points for your phones/laptops. Food and toiletries ‘Drop off and Pick up’ point at the TIC, everyone welcome to use this service. If you are in need of food or toiletries, please see Mel Mon – Weds and we’ll be happy to put a bag together for you. Our staff love a chat (especially about all things Sudbury) so please pop in and stay as long as you like. We are fully accessible. We run Heritage Detective school holidays activities. We’re dog friendly.

hours._text: Mon-Thurs: 09.45-16.30 Fri: 09.45-16.00 Sat: 10.00-13.00 (Museum) and 10.00-15.00 (Tourist Information Centre)

properties.description: There is room at our inn, so come one, come all for our Community Christmas. Alone? In need of a little extra festive cheer? Whatever the reason, please do feel free to spend Christmas lunch with us. We will provide a traditional or vegetarian Christmas lunch, good company, and transport can be arranged where needed. Singles, couple and families welcome. Our doors open at 12.30pm Christmas day at The Masonic Hall, North Street. There is no charge. For more information contact Teresa or Rebecca: 01787 311558 email bishopteresa78@gmail.com
